title: T207 BLANK BACK & Hand-Cut!! SGC Graded...SOLD!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: T207 BLANK BACK & Hand-Cut!! SGC Graded...SOLD!!
posts.post_content:
Has a definitive "hand-cut" feel with all four borders being wavy and one corner in particular measuring fairly wide/oversized.  Neat blank back which is very seldom seen from this set.  Card is in great condition with no wrinkling or any wear to speak of.  Centering is a bit off....lol

Asking $185 delivered.  Thanks in advance!

Brian
